Hydras:

"Not mere a spark, my tutor"hissed Hydras"A blank protophorm and my men... 
What do you need or wish to exchange?"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 2010 10:06 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> "and you pretend to take over the base and face all the risk and when the
> territory is safe... just come a claim it "hissed Hydras

Cryotek leaned foward as he tilted his head as if examining Hydras
more closely. Finally he smiled, "You would think I would send you
there just to take the base after you have it?" Cryotek shook his head
making tsking noises.

"Ahh, then it is your choice." He shrugged casually as he gestured at
Hydras, a look sorrow passing over his features for a moment.

Cryotek glanced at the dark form of Obsidian, "You will take your
troops then as will Jetstorm. If you need any back up Tankor will be
on standby."

Obsidian nodded once at Cryotek, "It will be as you command." He said
quietly. With a last glance at Hydras he turned to leave the room,
already on his radio calling Jetstorm. Meanwhile several female mechs
that looked like they would turn into some sort of all terrain vehicle
stepped into the room and flanked the door as if on guard duty.

Cryotek turned to look at Hydras, "Now then you were wanting something
from me again? Ahhh yes, a spark in my holdings. Hmmmm, what do you
have to give in exchange then?"

(TAG)

Preston
